pageTitle: Prime Minister announces a change to the Ministry | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today welcomed a new member to Cabinet:

  • Joyce Murray, currently Parliamentary Secretary to the President of the Treasury Board and Minister of Digital Government, becomes President of the Treasury Board and Minister of Digital Government.

In her new role, Minister Murray will help advance the priorities of the Government of Canada and deliver its commitments to Canadians. The Government of Canada will continue its focus on growing the economy for the middle class and building a better future for people and communities across the country.
